api_list.api_description: Take a screenshot of the target website.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the website to screenshot.

api_list.api_description: Get information about a color in various formats and its contrasting text colors.

required_parameters.name: color
required_parameters.description: The color in Keyword, HEX, RGB, RGBA, HSL, or HSLA format.

query: Can you take a screenshot of the Python official website and get details about the HEX color '#3498db', including its grayscale and complementary colors?
